TopicTitle: How to make two vessels point the same way?

Articles.Content:
Let\'s say I have Vessel A and Vessel B. They\'re close enough to each other (< 1km) so they\'re both loaded into physics and such.

I want to make Vessel B have the same heading as Vessel A, but I\'m not sure how to do it well. I\'ve tried messing around with the SetRotation (don\'t have the API with me, might be wrong name), but the sudden rotation causes Vessel B to explode.

Any suggestions?
